checkProposer(address,bytes).details: IMPORTANT: The first preconfer of each epoch must submit the lookahead for the next epoch.      The contract enforces this by trying to update the lookahead for next epoch if none is stored.

params._lookaheadData: The lookahead data for current and next epoch.
params._proposer: The address of the proposer to check.

returns.submissionSlotTimestamp_: The timestamp of the submission slot i.e also the upper         boundary of preconfing period.

returns._0: The lookahead hash. If the epoch is not found, returns 0.
The configuration of the lookahead store.

isLookaheadOperatorValid(uint256,bytes32.details: Reverts if the operator is not valid

params._nextEpochTimestamp: The timestamp of the next epoch.
params._registrationRoot: The URC registration root of the operator.

returns._0: True if the operator is valid

isLookaheadPosterValid(uint256,bytes32).details: Reverts if the operator is not valid

params._nextEpochTimestamp: The timestamp of the next epoch.
params._registrationRoot: The URC registration root of the poster.

returns._0: True if the poster is valid
True if the lookahead is required for the next epoch, false otherwise.

calculateLookaheadHash(uint256,(address,.notice: Calculates the lookahead hash for a given epoch and lookahead slots.

checkProposer(address,bytes).notice: Checks if a proposer is eligible to propose for the current slot and conditionally         updates the lookahead for the next epoch.

getLookaheadHash(uint256).notice: Returns the lookahead hash for an epoch.

getLookaheadStoreConfig().notice: Returns the configuration of the lookahead store.

isLookaheadOperatorValid(uint256,bytes32.notice: Checks if a lookahead operator is valid for the next epoch.

isLookaheadPosterValid(uint256,bytes32).notice: Checks if a lookahead poster is valid for the next epoch.

isLookaheadRequired().notice: Returns true if the lookahead is required for the next epoch.

documentation.text:
@notice Returns true if the lookahead is required for the next epoch.
 @return True if the lookahead is required for the next epoch, false otherwise.

@notice Returns the configuration of the lookahead store.
 @return The configuration of the lookahead store.
